1.「プルプルッ！ ねえ 知ってる？| オンラインで行ける世界では| 人間以外の種族:
Jiggle! Hey, you know what? There's an online|world where non-human species live! It's|hundreds of times bigger than this island, and|
|every day it attracts more and more players!|You can join up with other players and go on|adventures together, cheer on those who are|
|fighting, and even buy weapons and armor made|by strangers in the shop! But it doesn't mean|that you have to play with other people, and|
|if you play alone, you can enjoy it just like|any Dragon Quest. If you've never been to the|new Dragon Quest world, you definitely need to|
|see it for yourself!
